Package com.salesforce.multicloudj.iam.client

Class IamClient

java.lang.Object
com.salesforce.multicloudj.iam.client.IamClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class IamClient extends Object implements AutoCloseable
Entry point for client code to interact with Identity and Access Management (IAM) services in a substrate-agnostic way.

This client provides unified IAM operations across multiple cloud providers including AWS IAM, GCP IAM, and AliCloud RAM. It handles the complexity of different cloud IAM models and provides a consistent API for identity lifecycle management and policy operations.

Usage example: 

 IamClient client = IamClient.builder("aws")
     .withRegion("us-west-2")
     .build();

 // Create identity
 String identityId = client.createIdentity("MyRole", "Example role", "123456789012", "us-west-2",
     Optional.empty(), Optional.empty());

 // Create policy
 PolicyDocument policy = PolicyDocument.builder()
     .version("2012-10-17")  // Use provider-specific version (AWS example)
     .statement("StorageAccess")
         .effect("Allow")
         .addAction("storage:GetObject")
         .addResource("storage://my-bucket/*")
     .endStatement()
     .build();

 // Attach policy
 client.attachInlinePolicy(policy, "123456789012", "us-west-2", "my-bucket");

  • Method Details

    • builder

      public static IamClient.IamClientBuilder builder(String providerId)
      Creates a new IamClientBuilder for the specified provider.
      Parameters:
      providerId - the ID of the provider such as "aws", "gcp", or "ali"
      Returns:
      a new IamClientBuilder instance

    • createIdentity

      public String createIdentity(String identityName, String description, String tenantId, String region, Optional<TrustConfiguration> trustConfig, Optional<CreateOptions> options)
      Creates a new identity (role/service account) in the cloud provider.
      Parameters:
      identityName - the name of the identity to create
      description - optional description for the identity (can be null)
      tenantId - the tenant ID (AWS Account ID, GCP Project ID, or AliCloud Account ID)
      region - the region for IAM operations
      trustConfig - optional trust configuration
      options - optional creation options
      Returns:
      the unique identifier of the created identity

    • attachInlinePolicy

      public void attachInlinePolicy(PolicyDocument policyDocument, String tenantId, String region, String resource)
      Attaches an inline policy to a resource.
      Parameters:
      policyDocument - the policy document in substrate-neutral format
      tenantId - the tenant ID
      region - the region
      resource - the resource to attach the policy to

    • getInlinePolicyDetails

      public String getInlinePolicyDetails(GetInlinePolicyDetailsRequest request)
      Retrieves the details of a specific inline policy attached to an identity.
      Parameters:
      request - the request containing identity name, policy name, role name, tenant ID, and region. Policy name and role name are optional and subject to cloud semantics.
      Returns:
      the policy document details as a string

    • getAttachedPolicies

      public List<String> getAttachedPolicies(GetAttachedPoliciesRequest request)
      Lists all inline policies attached to an identity.
      Parameters:
      request - the request containing identity name, tenant ID, and region
      Returns:
      a list of policy names

    • removePolicy

      public void removePolicy(String identityName, String policyName, String tenantId, String region)
      Removes an inline policy from an identity.
      Parameters:
      identityName - the name of the identity
      policyName - the name of the policy to remove
      tenantId - the tenant ID
      region - the region

    • deleteIdentity

      public void deleteIdentity(String identityName, String tenantId, String region)
      Deletes an identity from the cloud provider.
      Parameters:
      identityName - the name of the identity to delete
      tenantId - the tenant ID
      region - the region

    • getIdentity

      public String getIdentity(String identityName, String tenantId, String region)
      Retrieves metadata about an identity.
      Parameters:
      identityName - the name of the identity
      tenantId - the tenant ID
      region - the region
      Returns:
      the unique identity identifier (ARN, email, or roleId)
